name: Lapland Revolution
description:
Many mistreatments have been pursued during history, and only God knows how many of them have been burked.

Now, we are eventually able to know the Lapland truth, as Elves have finally raised their voices and quit their slavery status.

Here you play as Santa, and your scope is reaching the Christmas Tree and spend the night.

Be aware of Elves, they don't smile at you anymore.
Deers just stop working, they are stupid and stand in the white as snowmans.

They can either protect or obstacle you; however, you can destroy by moving toward to them.

Collect drink and food to raise your energy.
